entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 06 January 2023
